title: Metzl Says AI Will Aid in Fighting Coronavirus
itunes:title: Metzl Says AI Will Aid in Fighting Coronavirus
description:
Jamie Metzl, Senior Fellow at the Atlantic Council, explains how the use of artificial intelligence will become important to managing healthcare during the coronavirus outbreak. He also discusses how a U.S. collaboration with China is necessary to combat the pandemic.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
